document.full_text: british tuberculosis screening for new immigrants fails to detect most imported cases of latent disease and screening should be widened to include more people from the indian subcontinent, scientists said on thursday.
document.title: uk immigrant screening misses most latent tb: study
lines_and_colors: british tuberculosis screening for new immigrants fails to detect most imported cases of latent disease and screening should be widened to include more people from the indian subcontinent, scientists said on thursday.
